SELECT A.NOTICE_CODE_PK , A.TITLE , A.CAREER , A.EDUCATION , A.ENT_LOCATION , A.POST_START_DATE , B.COM_NAME , C.IS_ACCEPTED FROM TBL_JS_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_COM_COMPANY B ON (A.COMPANY_CODE_FK = B.COMPANY_CODE_PK) JOIN TBL_JS_APPLICATION C ON (A.NOTICE_CODE_PK = C.NOTICE_CODE_FK) WHERE C.MEMBER_CODE_FK = #{memberCode}
AND A.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
AND B.COM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
ORDER BY A.NOTICE_CODE_PK OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.COM_NAME , B.COM_URL , A.TITLE AS aTITLE , C.TITLE AS bTITLE , E.SELF_INTRODUCTION_CATEGORY , D.APPLICATION_DATE , D.IS_ACCEPTED FROM TBL_JS_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_JS_SELF_INTRODUCTION E ON (A.NOTICE_CODE_PK = E.NOTICE_CODE_FK) JOIN TBL_JS_APPLICATION D ON (A.NOTICE_CODE_PK = D.NOTICE_CODE_FK) JOIN TBL_RSM_RESUME C ON (D.RESUME_CODE_FK = C.RESUME_CODE_PK) JOIN TBL_COM_COMPANY B ON (A.COMPANY_CODE_FK = B.COMPANY_CODE_PK) WHERE A.NOTICE_CODE_PK = #{noticeCode} AND D.MEMBER_CODE_FK = #{memberCode}

SELECT A.DESCRIPTION , A.INTERVIEW_DATE , B.COM_NAME , B.COM_URL , B.COM_ADDRESS , B.NUM_EMP FROM TBL_MT_INTERVIEW_SUGGESTION A JOIN TBL_COM_COMPANY B ON (A.COMPANY_CODE_FK = B.COMPANY_CODE_PK) WHERE A.INTERVIEW_SUGGESTION_CODE_PK = #{interviewSuggestionCode}
